mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_NUM "USER_NUM", A.USER_EMAIL "USER_EMAIL", A.USER_NAME "USER_NAME" ,A.USER_CAREER "USER_CAREER", A.USER_PHOTO "USER_PHOTO" ,B.STORY_NUM "STORY_NUM", B.STORY_CONTENT "STORY_CONTENT" ,B.STORY_DATE "STORY_DATE" ,B.STORY_PHOTO "STORY_PHOTO" FROM SNS_USERINFO A, SNS_STORY B WHERE A.USER_EMAIL = B.USER_EMAIL(+) AND B.USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail} ORDER BY STORY_NUM DESC
